entries.original: **PR #594** — `isOmcStatusLine()` guard: preserves custom statusLine config on forced update (#567)
entries.translation: **PR #594** — `isOmcStatusLine()` 가드: 강제 업데이트 시 사용자 정의 statusLine 설정 유지 (#567)

entries.original: **PR #596** — Remove `commands/` directory: fixes omc-setup infinite self-loop (#582)
entries.translation: **PR #596** — `commands/` 디렉토리 제거: omc-setup 무한 루프 수정 (#582)

entries.original: **PR #598** — Mandate structured approval and ralph handoff in consensus mode (#595)
entries.translation: **PR #598** — 합의 모드에서 구조화된 승인 및 랄프 핸드오프 필수화 (#595)

entries.original: **PR #599** — Fire AskUserQuestion notification at PreToolUse instead of PostToolUse (#597)
entries.translation: **PR #599** — PreToolUse에서 AskUserQuestion 알림 발생, PostToolUse 대신 (#597)

entries.original: **PR #601** — Add user feedback step between Planner and Architect/Critic in consensus mode (#600)
entries.translation: **PR #601** — 합의 모드에서 Planner와 Architect/Critic 사이에 사용자 피드백 단계 추가 (#600)

entries.original: — Merge dev into main for 4.2.7 release
